alfredsnippet.snippet:
"... without a shred of empirical evidence, a generation of theoretical physicists has speculated that the four dimensions of our experience may themselves be just a grand illusion -- the tip of a cosmic iceberg."

- Lawrence M. Krauss, Science and Religion Share Fascination in Things Unseen, NY Times, November 8, 2005
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - The Grand Illusion
